references.paper_title: Diffusion policy: Visuomotor policy learning via action diffusion
references.reason: This paper introduces the diffusion policy used for imitation learning in the current work.

references.paper_title: Mobile ALOHA: Learning bimanual mobile manipulation with low-cost whole-body teleoperation
references.reason: This paper presents Mobile ALOHA, a state-of-the-art dual-arm mobile manipulation platform which is compared to in the current work.

references.paper_title: Consistency Policy: Accelerated visuomotor policies via consistency distillation
references.reason: This paper details Consistency Policy, a technique for training imitation learning policies used in the experiments of the current work.

references.paper_title: Development and control of a holonomic mobile robot for mobile manipulation tasks
references.reason: This paper details the powered-caster vehicle kinematics used for low-level control in the current work.

references.paper_title: Open X-Embodiment: Robotic learning datasets and RT-X models
references.reason: This describes a large-scale dataset for robot learning which motivates the data collection aims of the current work.
